title: "CHA releases English report on ‘gwaebul’ Buddhist paintings"
excerpt: "A research arm of the Cultural Heritage Administration published for the first time an English report on “gwaebul,” large paintings depicting Buddha preaching to his followers that are hung outside temples when rituals take place."
